description: Configuration for MPC-based rolling horizon optimization. Core MPC algorithm parameters only. For test scenarios (country, duration, alpha sweep, visualization), see mpc_test_config.json

mpc_parameters.description: MPC rolling horizon settings. horizon_hours: optimization lookahead window. execution_hours: committed/executed window (receding horizon step). initial_soc_fraction: starting battery SOC (0.0-1.0). validate_constraints: post-solve validation (disabled for speed)

notes.solver_settings: Solver timeouts and tolerances in solver_config.json
